00003 namespace yamte;

00006 // Function:         dump
00007 // Inspired from:     PHP.net Contributions
00008 // Description: Helps with php debugging
00009 
00010 function dump(&$var, $info = FALSE)
00011 {
00012     $scope = false;
00013     $prefix = 'unique';
00014     $suffix = 'value';
00015 
00016     if($scope) $vals = $scope;
00017     else $vals = $GLOBALS;
00018 
00019     $old = $var;
00020     $var = $new = $prefix.rand().$suffix; $vname = FALSE;
00021     foreach($vals as $key => $val) if($val === $new) $vname = $key;
00022     $var = $old;
00023 
00024     echo "<pre style='margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; display: block; background: white; color: black; font-family: Verdana; border: 1px solid #cccccc; padding: 5px; font-size: 10px; line-height: 13px;'>";
00025     if($info != FALSE) echo "<b style='color: red;'>$info:</b><br>";
00026     do_dump($var, '$'.$vname);
00027     echo "</pre>";
00028 }
00029 
00031 // Function:         do_dump
00032 // Inspired from:     PHP.net Contributions
00033 // Description: Better GI than print_r or var_dump
00034 
00035 function do_dump(&$var, $var_name = NULL, $indent = NULL, $reference = NULL)
00036 {
00037     $do_dump_indent = "<span style='color:#eeeeee;'>|</span> &nbsp;&nbsp; ";
00038     $reference = $reference.$var_name;
00039     $keyvar = 'the_do_dump_recursion_protection_scheme'; $keyname = 'referenced_object_name';
00040 
00041     if (is_array($var) && isset($var[$keyvar]))
00042     {
00043         $real_var = &$var[$keyvar];
00044         $real_name = &$var[$keyname];
00045         $type = ucfirst(gettype($real_var));
00046         echo "$indent$var_name <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type</span> = <span style='color:#e87800;'>&amp;$real_name</span><br>";
00047     }
00048     else
00049     {
00050         $var = array($keyvar => $var, $keyname => $reference);
00051         $avar = &$var[$keyvar];
00052 
00053         $type = ucfirst(gettype($avar));
00054         if($type == "String") $type_color = "<span style='color:green'>";
00055         elseif($type == "Integer") $type_color = "<span style='color:red'>";
00056         elseif($type == "Double"){ $type_color = "<span style='color:#0099c5'>"; $type = "Float"; }
00057         elseif($type == "Boolean") $type_color = "<span style='color:#92008d'>";
00058         elseif($type == "NULL") $type_color = "<span style='color:black'>";
00059 
00060         if(is_array($avar))
00061         {
00062             $count = count($avar);
00063             echo "$indent" . ($var_name ? "$var_name => ":"") . "<span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type ($count)</span><br>$indent(<br>";
00064             $keys = array_keys($avar);
00065             foreach($keys as $name)
00066             {
00067                 $value = &$avar[$name];
00068                 do_dump($value, "['$name']", $indent.$do_dump_indent, $reference);
00069             }
00070             echo "$indent)<br>";
00071         }
00072         elseif(is_object($avar))
00073         {
00074             echo "$indent$var_name <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type</span><br>$indent(<br>";
00075             foreach($avar as $name=>$value) do_dump($value, "$name", $indent.$do_dump_indent, $reference);
00076             echo "$indent)<br>";
00077         }
00078         elseif(is_int($avar)) echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> $type_color$avar</span><br>";
00079         elseif(is_string($avar)) echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> $type_color\"$avar\"</span><br>";
00080         elseif(is_float($avar)) echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> $type_color$avar</span><br>";
00081         elseif(is_bool($avar)) echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> $type_color".($avar == 1 ? "TRUE":"FALSE")."</span><br>";
00082         elseif(is_null($avar)) echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> {$type_color}NULL</span><br>";
00083         else echo "$indent$var_name = <span style='color:#a2a2a2'>$type(".strlen($avar).")</span> $avar<br>";
00084 
00085         $var = $var[$keyvar];
00086     }
00087 }
